name: chunkily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a chunky (= large, thick, or heavy) way: The cabinet is chunkily built, and finished in an industrial-type grey paint. I like to serve the chunkily cut meat on a bed of rich, sweet-and-sour braised red cabbage.
More examplesFewer examplesChunkily built and darkly handsome, he looks rather like a 1950s film star. The tiger's muscles shifted chunkily beneath its skin. All the sweets are made in his own kitchen, and the delicious toffees are chunkily handmade.
